title: Luminary: A Post-Lecture Reception with Mel Bochner
hero_caption:
Mel Bochner. Measurement: 1" to 12" (Color), 1994. Collection of Wendy Evans Joseph. Image © Mel Bochner
Photography by Nicholas Knight Studio, New York. Courtesy of Peter Freeman, Inc., New York.
short_description:
Join Luminary for this unique opportunity to explore the work of renowned artist Mel Bochner with President and Eloise W. Martin Director, James Rondeau, and Kevin Salatino, Anne Vogt Fuller and Marion Titus Searle Chair and Curator of Prints and Drawings. 

When you register for this event, you will automatically be registered—with priority seating—for the preceding member lecture in Fullerton Hall at 4:00.
list_description: Join Luminary for this opportunity to explore the work of renowned artist Mel Bochner with President and Eloise W. Martin Director, James Rondeau, and Kevin Salatino, Anne Vogt Fuller and Marion Titus Searle Chair and Curator of Prints and Drawings.
description:
Immediately following the April 22 member lecture featuring artist Mel Bochner; James Rondeau, President and Eloise W. Martin Director; and Kevin Salatino, Anne Vogt Fuller and Marion Titus Searle Chair and Curator of Prints and Drawings, continue the conversation with the event’s participants during this intimate reception.

When you register for this event, you will automatically be registered—with priority seating—for the preceding member lecture in Fullerton Hall at 4:00.

To ensure a safe gallery experience, all guests must follow the visiting policies in place at the time of the event. This event takes place when the museum is closed to the public. Coat check and valet services will be available.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
Free, registration required
This invitation is for two individuals per Luminary household.
